text: rundhE praqvA&sya#nuqvA&sItyA#ha mithunaqtvAyOqSiga#siq vasu#ByastvAq vasU$~jjiqnvEtyA#hAqShTau vasa#vaq EkA#daSa ruqdrA dvAda#SA&&*diqtyA EqtAva#ntOq vai dEqvAstEBya# Eqva yaqj~jaM prA&&*haujO#&si piqtRuBya#stvA piqtRUn jiqnvEtyA#ha dEqvAnEqva piqtRUnanuq santa#nOtiq tantu#rasi praqjABya#stvA praqjA jiqnvE - [  ]   7
